org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation

Class DeployableRemediation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation.DeployableRemediation

  • public class DeployableRemediation
extends Object
    Class representing a deployable remediation = a list of DeployableRemediationAction (remediations that can be deployed on a host) with a cost.
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy
